GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Catalog Revenue Packs By Code 100 Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Combine quantities of catalog revenue items into 5,10,25,100 packs. Based on revenue selection.
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Catalog Revenue Packs By Code 100 Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_CATALOGREVENUEPACKS_BYCODE_100 (
@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CATALOGREVENUESELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @MYCATALOGCODE VARCHAR(30), @MY5PACKCODE VARCHAR(30), @MY10PACKCODE VARCHAR(30), @MY25PACKCODE VARCHAR(30), @MY50PACKCODE VARCHAR(30), @MY100PACKCODE VARCHAR(30) ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime declare @PACK5 uniqueidentifier declare @PACK10 uniqueidentifier declare @PACK25 uniqueidentifier declare @PACK50 uniqueidentifier declare @PACK100 uniqueidentifier set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
set @PACK5 = (select id from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode=@MY5PACKCODE) set @PACK10 = (select id from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode=@MY10PACKCODE) set @PACK25 = (select id from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode=@MY25PACKCODE) set @PACK50 = (select id from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode=@MY50PACKCODE) set @PACK100 = (select id from usr_catalogitemattribute where catalogcode=@MY100PACKCODE)
DECLARE @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CATALOGREVENUESELECTIONID)
declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), CATALOGREVENUEID uniqueidentifier, CATALOGCODE nvarchar(50), INITIALQUANTITY integer, CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier, CHANGEDATE datetime ) declare @I int = 1
-- insert records that meet criteria insert into @T select CR.ID, CIA.CATALOGCODE, CR.QUANTITY, CR.CHANGEDBYID, CR.DATECHANGED from dbo.USR_CATALOGREVENUE CR inner join dbo.USR_CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTE CIA on cia.id = cr.catalogitemattributeid inner join dbo.REVENUE R on R.id = cr.revenueid inner join @CATALOGREVENUESELECTION SelectionResults on SelectionResults.ID = r.ID where cia.catalogcode=@MYCATALOGCODE -- if cr.quantity is not >= 5, then it's already been processed or doesn't need to be processed and cr.quantity >= 5
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
declare @CATALOGREVENUEID uniqueidentifier declare @CATALOGCODE nvarchar(50) declare @INITIALQUANTITY integer declare @CATALOGREVENUECHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier declare @CHANGEDATE datetime -- declare variables for calculated quantities declare @QUANTITY1 integer declare @QUANTITY5 integer declare @QUANTITY10 integer declare @QUANTITY25 integer declare @QUANTITY50 integer declare @QUANTITY100 integer --declare @FIVEPACKSONLY bit = 0 declare @DO100 bit = 0 declare @DO50 bit = 0 declare @DO25 bit = 0 declare @DO10 bit = 0 declare @DO5 bit = 0
if ltrim(rtrim(@MY100PACKCODE)) <> '' begin set @DO100 = 1 end if ltrim(rtrim(@MY50PACKCODE)) <> '' begin set @DO50 = 1 end if ltrim(rtrim(@MY25PACKCODE)) <> '' begin set @DO25 = 1 end if ltrim(rtrim(@MY10PACKCODE)) <> '' begin set @DO10 = 1 end if ltrim(rtrim(@MY5PACKCODE)) <> '' begin set @DO5 = 1 end
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE if (@DO5=1) or (@DO10=1) or (@DO25=1) or (@DO50=1) or (@DO100=1) begin while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @CATALOGREVENUEID = CATALOGREVENUEID, @CATALOGCODE = CATALOGCODE, @INITIALQUANTITY = INITIALQUANTITY, @CATALOGREVENUECHANGEAGENTID = CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEDATE = CHANGEDATE, --@QUANTITY25 = abs(INITIALQUANTITY/25), --@QUANTITY5 = (INITIALQUANTITY%25/5), @QUANTITY1 = INITIALQUANTITY%5 --this will be adjusted below. This was from when we just had 5 and 25 packs. from @T where PK = @I
--khamling begin testing quick way to add 100 packs if @DO100 = 1 begin set @QUANTITY100 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/100) set @INITIALQUANTITY = @INITIALQUANTITY%100 -- This is how I could have coded logic for all packs, but not worth recoding at this point --@INTITIALQUANTITY is actually remaining quantity after 100 pack applied set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY -- singles at this point end --khamling end testing quick way to add 100 packs
--khamling begin testing quick way to add 50 packs @INITIALQUANTITY is number of singles at this point if @DO50 = 1 begin set @QUANTITY50 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/50) set @INITIALQUANTITY = @INITIALQUANTITY%50 -- This is how I could have coded logic for all packs, but not worth recoding at this point --@INTITIALQUANTITY is now remaining quantity after 50 pack applied set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY -- singles at this point end --khamling end testing quick way to add 50 packs
--khamling begin testing quick way to add 25 packs @INITIALQUANTITY is number of singles at this point if @DO25 = 1 begin set @QUANTITY25 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/25) set @INITIALQUANTITY = @INITIALQUANTITY%25 -- This is how I could have coded logic for all packs, but not worth recoding at this point --@INTITIALQUANTITY is now remaining quantity after 25 pack applied set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY -- singles at this point end --khamling end testing quick way to add 25 packs
--khamling begin testing quick way to add 10 packs @INITIALQUANTITY is number of singles at this point if @DO10 = 1 begin set @QUANTITY10 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/10) set @INITIALQUANTITY = @INITIALQUANTITY%10 -- This is how I could have coded logic for all packs, but not worth recoding at this point --@INTITIALQUANTITY is now remaining quantity after 10 pack applied set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY -- singles at this point end --khamling end testing quick way to add 10 packs
--khamling begin testing quick way to add 5 packs @INITIALQUANTITY is number of singles at this point if @DO5 = 1 begin set @QUANTITY5 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/5) set @INITIALQUANTITY = @INITIALQUANTITY%5 -- This is how I could have coded logic for all packs, but not worth recoding at this point --@INTITIALQUANTITY is now remaining quantity after 5 pack applied set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY -- singles at this point end --khamling end testing quick way to add 5 packs
--This was the old code that was the simple way when we just had 5 and 25 packs, but got too complicated, so replaced with clean code above /* if @DO25 = 1 --DO25 begin set @QUANTITY25 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/25) set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY%25 if @DO10 = 1 -- DO25, DO10 begin set @QUANTITY10 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY%25/10) set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY%10 if @DO5 = 1 --DO25, DO10, DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = abs(((@INITIALQUANTITY%25)%10) / 5) set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY%5 end else --DO25, DO10, NOT DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = 0 end end else -- DO25 and NOT DO10 begin set @QUANTITY10 = 0 if @DO5 = 1 --DO25, NOT DO10, DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = (@INITIALQUANTITY%25/5) set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY%5 end else --DO25, NOT DO10, NOT DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = 0 end end end else -- NOT DO25 begin set @QUANTITY25 = 0 if @DO10 = 1 -- NOT DO25, DO10 begin set @QUANTITY10 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/10) set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY%10 if @DO5 = 1 --NOT DO25, DO10, DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY%10/5) set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY%5 end else --NOT DO25, DO10, NOT DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = 0 end end else -- MOT DO25 and NOT DO10 begin set @QUANTITY10 = 0 if @DO5 = 1 --NOT DO25, NOT DO10, DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = abs(@INITIALQUANTITY/5) set @QUANTITY1 = @INITIALQUANTITY%5 end else --NOT DO25, NOT DO10, NOT DO5 begin set @QUANTITY5 = 0 end end end */ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- create new CATALOGREVENUE records with new codes and correct quantities, which were calculated in SELECT statement above. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- if @CATALOGCODE = @MYCATALOGCODE --will always be true unless insert/select is changed to pull other codes above. --question: Do I need to adjust price or fairmarket? No per Ted begin begin try set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + 1; ------------
if @QUANTITY100 > 0 begin insert into USR_CATALOGREVENUE ( --ID, TRANSACTIONID, CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTEID, QUANTITY, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER ) select --ID, TRANSACTIONID, --following id is Honor Card 25 pack @PACK100, @QUANTITY100, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER from USR_CATALOGREVENUE where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID end
if @QUANTITY50 > 0 begin insert into USR_CATALOGREVENUE ( --ID, TRANSACTIONID, CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTEID, QUANTITY, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER ) select --ID, TRANSACTIONID, --following id is Honor Card 25 pack @PACK50, @QUANTITY50, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER from USR_CATALOGREVENUE where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID end
if @QUANTITY25 > 0 begin insert into USR_CATALOGREVENUE ( --ID, TRANSACTIONID, CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTEID, QUANTITY, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER ) select --ID, TRANSACTIONID, --following id is Honor Card 25 pack @PACK25, @QUANTITY25, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER from USR_CATALOGREVENUE where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID end if @QUANTITY10 > 0 begin insert into USR_CATALOGREVENUE ( --ID, TRANSACTIONID, CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTEID, QUANTITY, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER ) select --ID, TRANSACTIONID, --following id is Honor Card 10 pack @PACK10, @QUANTITY10, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER from USR_CATALOGREVENUE where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID end if @QUANTITY5 > 0 begin insert into USR_CATALOGREVENUE ( --ID, TRANSACTIONID, CATALOGITEMATTRIBUTEID, QUANTITY, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER ) select --ID, TRANSACTIONID, --following id is Honor Card 5 pack @PACK5, @QUANTITY5, PRICE, FAIRMARKET, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED, --TS, --TSLONG, FULFILLED, REVENUEID, ADDRESSID, SHIPTONAME, TAXAMOUNT, CATALOGITEMID, CATALOGTYPEID, FROMNAME, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPTOADDRESS1, SHIPTOADDRESS2, SHIPTOCITY, SHIPTOSTATEID, SHIPTOCOUNTRYID, SHIPTOZIP, SHIPPINGOPTION, SHIPPINGPRICE, SHIPPINGATTENTION, SHIPPINGINSTRUCTIONS, PERSONALNOTE, SHIPPINGPRICEACTUAL, SHIPDATE, ISSHIPPED, TRACKINGNUMBER, FULFILLMENTNUMBER from USR_CATALOGREVENUE where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID end
-- question: Do I need to delete record or just set quantity to zero -- decision made to delete if @QUANTITY1 > 0 begin update USR_CATALOGREVENUE set QUANTITY = @QUANTITY1 where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID end else begin delete from usr_CATALOGREVENUE where id = @CATALOGREVENUEID end
------------ end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch end set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE end end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
